stem: Preemptible VMs can offer advantages over a standard Compute Engine VM. What is a reason customers choose preemptible VMs?
options/1/rationale: That's correct! The per-hour price of preemptible VMs incorporates a substantial discount.
options/3/title: To reduce cost on premium operating systems

stem: Which statement best describes how VPC routers and firewalls work?
options/0/title: They are managed by Google as a built-in feature.
options/1/title: Customers provision virtual machines and run their routers and firewalls in them.
options/2/title: They are managed by Google in virtual machines and customers can tune or deactivate them.
options/3/title: They are managed by Google in virtual machines and customers cannot modify them.
